    • Method Detail

      • initPrefs

        public static void initPrefs(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> init)
        Initializes the preference settings. If no initial preference settings are provided, the default preference settings are used (as if user did not change any settings).
        Parameters:
        init - The settings for initializing the preferences.

      • getPrefs

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getPrefs()

      • getAlwaysMiddlewareLocal

        public static boolean getAlwaysMiddlewareLocal()
        check if middleware should be launched locally always
        Returns:
        true iff middleware should be launched locally always.

      • getRememberLastUsedAgentDir

        public static boolean getRememberLastUsedAgentDir()
        check if last used directory should be remembered. Defaults to true.
        Returns:
        true iff last used directory should be remembered.

      • getRemoveKilledAgent

        public static boolean getRemoveKilledAgent()
        check if killed agents should be removed from the platform
        Returns:
        true if killed agents should be removed entirely.

      • getUseMASNameAsAgentPrefix

        public static boolean getUseMASNameAsAgentPrefix()
        Checks whether MAS name should be used as prefix for agent name.
        Returns:
        true if MAS name should be used as prefix.

      • getAgentCopyEnvRunState

        public static boolean getAgentCopyEnvRunState()
        Check if the agent should copy its run state from the environment. So if env is running, the agent should go to running. For other environment states, agents goes to pause mode. If there is no environment, the agent should be set to running. Default value is false.
        Returns:
        true if agents should run automatically, else false.

      • getSleepRepeatingAgent

        public static boolean getSleepRepeatingAgent()
        check if agents that repeat actions should be put to sleep till their percept input changes
        Returns:
        true if such agents should sleep, false else. Default is true.

      • getDefaultKRLanguage

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultKRLanguage()
        get the Default KR Language to use
        Returns:
        default KR language, typically "swiprolog".

      • getAgentBrowsePath

        public static java.lang.String getAgentBrowsePath()
        Get the path used when the user wants to browse for agents. Default is user's home dir as returned by System#getProperty("user.home"). This path may be set by the installer when the examples are installed in a user selected location.
        Note that this path is not relevant for opening agents or MAS file, since these are stored by ABSOLUTE PATH anyway.
        Returns:
        browse path for agents.

      • setAlwaysMiddlewareLocal

        public static void setAlwaysMiddlewareLocal(boolean middlewareLocal)
        if middleware should be launched locally always

      • setRememberLastUsedAgentDir

        public static void setRememberLastUsedAgentDir(boolean rememberLastUsedAgentDir)
        if last used directory should be remembered

      • setRemoveKilledAgent

        public static void setRemoveKilledAgent(boolean removeKilledAgent)
        if killed agents should be removed from the platform

      • setAgentCopyEnvRunState

        public static void setAgentCopyEnvRunState(boolean agentCopyEnvRunState)
        If the agent should copy its run state from the environment. So if env is running, the agent should go to running. For other environment states, agents goes to pause mode. If there is no environment, the agent should be set to running.

      • setSleepRepeatingAgent

        public static void setSleepRepeatingAgent(boolean sleepRepetetiveAgent)
        if agents that repeat actions should be put to sleep till their percept input changes

      • setDefaultKRLanguage

        public static void setDefaultKRLanguage(java.lang.String defaultKRLanguage)
        set the Default KR Language to use

      • setAgentBrowsePath

        public static void setAgentBrowsePath(java.lang.String agentsBrowseDir)
        Set the path used when the user wants to browse for agents. This path may be set by the installer when the examples are installed in a user selected location.
        Note that this path is not relevant for opening agents or MAS file, since these are stored by ABSOLUTE PATH anyway.

      • setPrefixAgentNameWithMASName

        public static void setPrefixAgentNameWithMASName(boolean useMASName)
